meanings.sent2: They were rhumbaing gracefully on the dance floor.

meanings.definition: The act of performing the rhumba dance.
meanings.sent1: His rhumbaing was the highlight of the show.
meanings.sent2: The group's rhumbaing was full of energy.
meanings.sent3: The rhumbaing competition was fierce but fun.
meanings.sent4: Her rhumbaing was like a beautiful painting in motion.
